title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, goals, and requirements. Conduct market research and gather user feedback to understand the needs and preferences of potential users.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture for the AI-Powered Financial Adviser project. This will include the AI model (explicitly mentioning use of XAI for transparency and user trust), data pipelines, integration with financial data sources, user interfaces, deployment infrastructure, and consider containerization for better scalability and portability. Ensure scalability, security, and performance requirements are met. Provide a detailed design document for review, addressing potential improvements and compliance analysis during the design phase. If possible, include a preliminary risk assessment. Include plans for testing and documentation.

title: AI Model Development
description: Research and develop the AI model for financial analysis and advice generation.

title: Data Pipeline and Integration
description: Develop data pipelines to ingest and process financial data from various sources, and integrate with the AI model.

title: User Interface Design for AI-Powered Financial Adviser (Revised)
description: Revised design proposal for the user interface of the financial advice platform. This includes user onboarding, profile management, advice presentation, and data visualization components. The updated design emphasizes simplicity, accessibility, responsiveness across various devices, and a user-centric approach based on UX research insights. Suggestions for interactive elements and personalized experiences are also included, with added focus on ensuring seamless integration with the system architecture and adherence to security guidelines. Further, it is recommended to collaborate with backend developers during the implementation phase to ensure smooth data flow and efficient performance.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures and ensure compliance with relevant regulations, such as data privacy and financial regulations.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop test plans and strategies for the AI model, data pipelines, and user interface. Conduct thorough testing and quality assurance.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure and implement DevOps practices for continuous integration, delivery, and monitoring.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the platform, including user guides, API documentation, and developer resources. Establish user support channels.
